channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-28153|2024-03-06T17:01:56.824Z -- Jenkins Project -- Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin
item.description: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 5.4.5 and earlier does not escape vulnerability metadata from Dependency-Check reports, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
